title: influence points
body: i want to buy ahri but it says error. what am i doing wrong. i have 4881. that should be enough for her right???

replies.body: thanks guys. nfor the help. i forgot to say that. sorry for the late thaks
I went to pull up your account to see what was going on, and it looks like you finally got Ahri purchased! Hit me back up if you're having any other issues!
There a bug with the IP display in the client and if you relogg it should update to show you the correct amount of IP on your account.
